attacks.name: Slam
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Mega Drain
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Leaf Storm
attacks.text: Heal 40 damage from each of your Grass Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flog
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Fluffy Transport
attacks.text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with his or her Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Solar Step
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the number of your remaining Prize cards.

attacks.name: Scout
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand.

abilities.name: Sonic Vision
abilities.text: If you have exactly 4 cards in your hand, ignore all Energy in the attack cost of each of this Pokémon's attacks.

attacks.name: Assault Boom
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 70 more damage.

attacks.name: Barrier Break
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon. Illustrated by 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Bide
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, if this Pokémon would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack during your opponent's next turn, it is not Knocked Out and its remaining HP becomes 10 instead.

attacks.name: Harden
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon would be damaged by an attack, prevent that attack's damage done to this Pokémon if that damage is 60 or less.

attacks.name: Wicked Wind
attacks.text: Until the end of your opponent's next turn, each Stadium or Pokémon Tool card in play has no effect. (This includes cards that come into play on that turn.)

attacks.name: Extrasensory
attacks.text: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 60 more damage.

abilities.name: Play Ball
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench, you may put 3 Poke Ball cards from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Crazy Spore
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Strange Reaction
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Confused, it is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Shimmering Scales
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused. If tails, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Power Hurricane
attacks.text: Discard all Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Returning Flames
attacks.text: Put 2 Fire Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Fire Blast
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flare Blitz
attacks.text: Discard all Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flare Up
attacks.text: If you have fewer than 10 Fire Energy cards in your discard pile, this attack does nothing. Shuffle 10 Fire Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.

attacks.name: Flare Blitz
attacks.text: Discard all Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon. Illustrated by 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Lunge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Flame Charge
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Fire Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Incinerate
attacks.text: Before doing damage, discard all Pokémon Tool cards attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Kaiser Tackle
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 50 damage to itself. Illustrated by 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Power Heater
attacks.text: Choose 2 of your Benched Pokémon. Attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to each of those Pokémon.

abilities.name: Steam Up
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Fire Energy card from your hand. If you do, during this turn, your Basic Fire Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Volcanic Heat
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.

attacks.name: Healing Wave
attacks.text: Discard as many cards as you like from your hand. Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Sticky Shot
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon's attacks cost Colorless more, and its Retreat Cost is Colorless more.

attacks.name: Water Pulse
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Razor Shell
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Ultimate Blade
attacks.text: If the damage from this attack reduces your opponent's Active Pokémon's HP to 60 or less, that Pokémon is Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Pike
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Double Pincers
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

abilities.name: Mega Boost
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Special Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Mega Evolution Pokémon.

attacks.name: Lock-On
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn. During your next turn, any damage done to that Pokémon by attacks is increased by 120 (after applying Weakness and Resistance). Illustrated by 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Ice Block
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Melting Floe
attacks.text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. For each Water Energy card you discarded in this way, discard the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Thunder Wave
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Thunder Shock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

abilities.name: Shocking Light
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put 3 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon-EX.

attacks.name: Gigavolt
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage. If tails, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Double Thread
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 2 of your opponent's Pokémon. Also apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Electroweb
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Come Along
attacks.text: Search your deck for Nidoran♀ and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Nido Press
attacks.text: If Nidorina is on your Bench, this attack does 40 more damage.

abilities.name: King's Palace
abilities.text: Your Nidoqueen's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Power Lariat
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Evolution Pokémon on your Bench.

attacks.name: Transfer Pain
attacks.text: Move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokémon to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Eerie Wave
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Burst Curse
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy attached to this Pokémon. Put 8 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Slightly Simmer
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 cards and discard them. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Mirror Mirror
attacks.text: Each player either draws or discards cards until that player has 4 cards in his or her hand. (Your opponent does this first.)

attacks.name: Flickering Flames
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

abilities.name: Sinister Selection
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 2 cards of your deck and put 1 of them into your hand. Discard the other card.

attacks.name: Past Friends
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each Supporter card in your discard pile.

attacks.name: Hyperspace Punch
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Portal Strike
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Portal Strike during your next turn.

attacks.name: Focus Energy
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Flop attack's base damage is 50.

attacks.name: Swagger
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Spirited Throw
attacks.text: If, before doing damage, your opponent's Active Pokémon has more remaining HP than this Pokémon, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Thunder Wave
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Bounce Back
attacks.text: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rock Tomb
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

abilities.name: Restored Barrier
abilities.text: Each of your Restored Pokémon has no Weakness.

attacks.name: X-Scissor
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Rushing Water
attacks.text: Move an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon to 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Guard Claw
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Poison Up
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is Poisoned, put 3 more damage counters on that Pokémon between turns. This effect can be applied more than once.

abilities.name: Poison Enzyme
abilities.text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Poisoned Pokémon.

attacks.name: Poison Jab
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Nyan Roll
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.

abilities.name: Tear Away
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may put a Pokémon Tool card attached to 1 of your Pokémon into your hand.

attacks.name: Nightmare
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Damage Play
attacks.text: Move as many damage counters on your opponent's Benched Pokémon as you like to any of your opponent's other Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Charge Order
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage times the number of your Pawniard.

attacks.name: Retaliate
attacks.text: If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack during his or her last turn, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Mach Claw
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Oblivion Wing
attacks.text: Attach a Darkness Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Darkness Blade
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.

attacks.name: Baleful Night
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Illustrated by 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Wild Edge
attacks.text: You may do 50 more damage. If you do, this Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Iron Tail
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 100 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Canyon Axe
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Rock Head
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Counter Head
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon is damaged by an attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon equal to the damage done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fortress of Rage
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each of your Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it.

attacks.name: Disorderly Flip
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Disorderly Flip
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

abilities.name: Heavy Bumper
abilities.text: Any damage done to this Pokémon by an opponent's attack is reduced by 10 for each Colorless in your opponent's Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Gear Spinner
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Gear Spinner attack does 70 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Quick Guard
attacks.text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Basic Pokémon during your opponent's next turn. This Pokémon can't use Quick Guard during your next turn.

attacks.name: Revenge Blast
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

abilities.name: Mystic Heart
abilities.text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's attacks, except damage, done to each of your Pokémon that has any Metal Energy attached to it. (Existing effects are not removed.)

attacks.name: Soul Blaster
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Soul Blaster attack's base damage is 60.

attacks.text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Play Rough
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Bubble Drain
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Link Blast
attacks.text: If this Pokémon and your opponent's Active Pokémon have the same amount of Energy attached to them, this attack does 70 more damage.

attacks.name: Luminous Blade
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Despair Ray
attacks.text: Discard as many of your Benched Pokémon as you like. This attack does 10 more damage for each Benched Pokémon you discarded in this way.

abilities.name: Wonder Lock
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may discard all cards attached to this Pokémon and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon as a Pokémon Tool card. Prevent any damage done to the Pokémon this card is attached to by attacks from your opponent's Mega Evolution Pokémon. If this card is attached to a Pokémon, discard this card at the end of your opponent's turn.

attacks.name: Geomancy
attacks.text: Choose 2 of your Benched Pokémon. For each of those Pokémon, search your deck for a Fairy Energy card and attach it to that Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Rainbow Spear
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Life Stream
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to all of your Pokémon. Illustrated by 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Proud Fang
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Pokémon BREAK in play, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Giga Claw
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Roar
attacks.text: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Power Breath
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Cruel Fang
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 40 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Dark Burn
attacks.text: Discard as many Darkness Energy attached to your Pokémon as you like. This attack does 50 damage times the amount of Darkness Energy you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Calamity Blast
attacks.text: Discard 3 Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 50 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Illustrated by 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Stall
attacks.text: You can use this attack only if you go second, and only on your first turn. Discard an Energy attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Raid
attacks.text: If this Pokémon evolved from Meowth during this turn, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Fiddle Around
attacks.text: Look at the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck and put them back in any order.

attacks.name: Furry Chance
attacks.text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck. If that card is an Energy card, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Double Hit
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Ambush
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 more damage.

abilities.name: Gale Wings
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is in your hand when you are setting up to play, you may put it face down as your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Aero Blitz
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

abilities.name: Sudden Cyclone
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench, you may have your opponent switch his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Acrobatics
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Armor Fossil Shieldon
rules: Look at the bottom 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Shieldon you find there and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Captivating Poké Puff
rules: Your opponent reveals his or her hand. Put any number of Basic Pokémon you find there onto your opponent's Bench.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Claw Fossil Anorith
rules: Look at the bottom 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal an Anorith you find there and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Gardevoir Spirit Link
rules: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Gardevoir-EX.

name: Greedy Dice
rules: You can play this card only if you took it as a face-down Prize card, before you put it into your hand.Flip a coin. If heads, take 1 more Prize card.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Ninja Boy
rules: Choose 1 of your Basic Pokémon in play. Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and switch it with that Pokémon. (Any attached cards, damage counters, Special Conditions, turns in play, and any other effects remain on the new Pokémon.) Shuffle the first Pokémon into your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Pokémon Ranger
rules: Remove all effects of attacks on each player and his or her Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Special Charge
rules: Shuffle 2 Special Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Steelix Spirit Link
rules: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Steelix-EX.
